title: 6 reasons why Jurgen Klopp would be the perfect man to replace Brendan Rodgers at Liverpool
text:
6 reasons why Jurgen Klopp would be the perfect man to replace Brendan Rodgers at Liverpool By Daniel Bevan (columnist) 02 Oct 2015 09:28:26 
reads 
comments 
This week former Borussia Dortmund manager Jurgen Klopp rejected the chance to take over the Mexican national team. Despite much speculation this is the first formal offer that has been made public and, inevitably, many more will surface of the next few weeks. However I believe that the best destination for Klopp with be Liverpool and he is exactly the manager that they need as pressure mounts on Brendan Rodgers. So here’s six reasons why: 
1) He can take a team the ‘next level’ 
As proven at Borussia Dortmund, Klopp is an expert in taking teams to the ‘next level’. He took a mid-table side, who finished 13th in his first season, to the top of the Bundesliga in just four year. In 2012 Klopp lead Dortmund to a record breaking domestic double, amassing 81 points throughout the season and defeating Bayern Munich 5-2 in the DFB-Pokal Final. Related Sport News
